doc:
Vivian Edwards https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vivian_Edwards 0 Vivian Edwards (September 10, 1896 in Los Angeles, CA – December 4, 1949 in Los Angeles) - American actress of silent film. She often played in Charlie Chaplin's earliest films in 1914 and 1915. Her role as one of the Goo goo sisters in "The Property Man", starring Chaplin was one of her most memorable roles. She is credited in 57 silent films. In 1926, she married director Bryan Foy. They had one daughter, Mary Jane (Foy) Landstrom. Vivian_Edwards ( September_10_,_1896 in Los_Angeles , CA – December_4_,_1949 in Los_Angeles ) - American_actress of silent_film . She often played in Charlie_Chaplin 's_earliest_films in 1914_and_1915 . Her_role as one of the_Goo_goo_sisters in " The_Property_Man_" , starring Chaplin was one of her_most_memorable_roles . She is_credited in 57_silent_films . In 1926 , she married director_Bryan_Foy . They had one_daughter , Mary_Jane (_Foy_)_Landstrom .
